marketplaces.name: humanities-skills
marketplaces.description: A marketplace for academic research skills focused on Chinese historical and geographical data analysis. Install both CBDB API for biographical data and CHGIS TGAZ for historical place names.
marketplaces.repo_description: Plugins related to humanities research. Mostly created by AI.

plugins.name: cbdb-api
plugins.description: Query the China Biographical Database API for comprehensive biographical data about historical Chinese figures from the 7th century BCE through the 19th century CE

author.name: Kwok-leong Tang
author.notes: Created with AI assistance from Claude and Z.ai

plugins.name: chgis-tgaz
plugins.description: Query the CHGIS Temporal Gazetteer API for historical Chinese placenames and administrative units from 222 BCE to 1911 CE

author.name: Kwok-leong Tang
author.notes: Created with AI assistance from Claude and Z.ai
